get.description: Returns a list of groups within a domain (organization or canvas)

post.description: Creates a new group within a domain (organization or canvas) with a specific role

get.description: Returns users that belong to a specific group within any domain

patch.description: Adds a user to a group within any domain
Removes a user from a group within any domain

get.description: Returns available roles for a specific domain type with their permissions and inheritance

post.description: Creates a new custom role with specified permissions

patch.description: Assigns a role to a user within an organization or canvas

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific role including permissions and inheritance

patch.description: Removes a role from a user within an organization or canvas

put.description: Updates an existing custom role with new permissions

get.description: Returns all permissions a user has within a specific domain
Returns the roles a user has within a specific domain
Returns a list of all canvases

post.description: Creates a new canvas with the given name and organization ID

get.description: Returns a list of all connection groups for the specified canvas (can be referenced by ID or name)

post.summary: Create a new canvas connection group
post.description: Creates a new canvas connection group

get.description: Returns the details of a specific connection group (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

patch.description: Updates the specified connection group (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns a list of field sets for the specified connection group (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)
Returns a list of all event sources for the specified canvas (can be referenced by ID or name)

post.description: Creates a new event source for the specified canvas (can be referenced by ID or name)

post.summary: Reset the key for an event source
post.description: Resets the key used to receive events from the specified event source (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns the details of a specific event source (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)
Returns a list of all secrets for the specified canvas (can be referenced by ID or name)
Returns the details of a specific secret (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

patch.description: Updates the specified secret (can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns a list of all stages for the specified canvas (can be referenced by ID or name)

post.description: Creates a new stage for the specified canvas (can be referenced by ID or name)

patch.description: Updates the specified stage (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns the details of a specific stage (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)
Returns a list of events for the specified stage (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

post.description: Approves the specified stage event (canvas can be referenced by ID or name)

get.description: Returns the details of a specific canvas
Returns a list of all organizations ordered by display name

post.description: Creates a new organization with the given name and display name

get.description: Returns the details of a specific organization (can be referenced by ID or name)

delete.description: Deletes the specified organization (can be referenced by ID or name)

patch.description: Updates the specified organization (can be referenced by ID or name)

ConnectionFilterOperator.title:
Filters can be combined in two ways:
  - FILTER_OPERATOR_AND: all filters must be true (default)
  - FILTER_OPERATOR_OR: at least one filter must be true

SecretLocal.description: Local secrets are stored and managed by SuperPlane itself.

metadata.title: No spec needed for Canvas as per the YAML example

SuperplaneEventSourceSpec.title: No additional configuration needed as per the YAML example
